creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: frame of yellow-brown marble with slender pilasters at the sides, the whole enclosed in narrow band of partly-gilded wood; at top, a small rectangular and wooden painted panel enclosed in gilded frame, representing a monastary(?) surmounting this panel, a gilded basket of flowers with scrolls and festoons of leaves and berries; leaves and berries repeated at bottom
title: Bilbao Mirror
